definition: guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general

sentences.english: That class increased her accomplishments as a pianist.
sentences.chinese: 那個培訓班增長了她作爲鋼琴師的技藝。

sentences.english: Yes, China has some good luthiers making handmade concert quality guitars.
sentences.chinese: 是的，中國現在有很多好琴師在製作手工演奏會琴。

sentences.english: ''The Legend of 1900'' is at least gorgeous to look at.
sentences.chinese: 當然《海上鋼琴師》至少乍看還是炫目的。

sentences.english: The pianist's execution of the concerto was marvellous.
sentences.chinese: 那鋼琴師彈的協奏曲神乎其技。

sentences.english: Please do not shoot the pianist. He is doing his best.
sentences.chinese: 請別開槍打死那個鋼琴師，他已經盡力了。

sentences.english: The pianist pounded out the tune with great effort.
sentences.chinese: 鋼琴師用了很大氣力才彈奏出這個調子。

sentences.english: The Sinfonietta shares the stage with a consort of viols.
sentences.chinese: 這支小交響樂隊與一羣六絃提琴師同臺獻藝。

sentences.english: I got the pianist from the genie".
sentences.chinese: 我從妖精那裏得到小鋼琴師的”。

sentences.english: Besides being a professional pianist, he is also a keen amateur singer.
sentences.chinese: 他不僅是名專業琴師，還是個熱情的業餘歌手。

sentences.english: Each luthier claiming that his method works very well.
sentences.chinese: 每個制琴師都說自己的方法很好。

sentences.english: Have you heard this Italian French luthier?
sentences.chinese: 你聽說這個在法國的意大利人琴師嗎？

sentences.english: The piano concerto was well rendered.
The luthiers usually do not sign these guitar labels.
sentences.chinese: 琴師也不會在琴上面簽名。

sentences.english: The past two decades have seen a renaissance of string-instrument-making (violins, violas and cellos) by luthiers across the world.
sentences.chinese: 對制琴師來說，近二十年是全球絃樂製作的復興時期。

sentences.english: He was perhaps the greatest organist and harpsichordist of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他可說是當代最偉大的風琴師和大鍵琴師。

definition: hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
lit. dragon soaring and tiger leaping (idiom)/fig. prosperous and bustling/vigorous and active
Nü Shu writing, a phonetic syllabary for Yao ethnic group 瑶族 瑤族 dialect designed and used by women in Jiangyong county 江永縣|江永县 in southern Hunan
lit. paper has become expensive in Luoyang (because everyone is making a copy of a popular story) (idiom)/fig. (of a product) to sell like hotcakes
in perfect harmony/in sync/lit. qin and se sing in harmony
with a will, you can achieve anything (idiom); cf 精誠所至，金石為開|精诚所至，金石为开[jing1 cheng2 suo3 zhi4 , jin1 shi2 wei4 kai1]
Yangdong county in Yangjiang 陽江|阳江[Yang2 jiang1], Guangdong
Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
